subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Pokey Chatman, who resigned as Louisiana State’s women’s basketball coach in March amid accusations of an improper relationship with a former player, will coach the Spartak Moscow Region professional women’s club in Russia, the Baton Rouge television station WAFB-TV reported. Neither the Spartak director, Khristina Boruzhko, nor Chatman’s father, Douglas Chatman, would confirm the report.
